config.saddlarr.title: == Saddle Arrows Config ==
config.saddlarr.setting1: Allow dismounting (shifting out) the saddle arrow
config.saddlarr.setting2: Allow automatically dismounting players from other entities to mount the saddle arrow
config.saddlarr.setting2_1: [Allow from all entities except the saddle arrow]
config.saddlarr.setting3: Show saddle on the saddle arrow entity
